extension.summary: Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger.
extension.description: This is a light mod of Arctic Zephyr 2 by heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 is a minimalistic skin created by jurialmunkey and moded to work with Kodi 19 Matrix by pkscout. The skin is designed to be simple so that the user can focus on their media content. In addition to the default light colour scheme, the skin also includes a number of darker variations.

Jest to modyfikacja skórki Arctic Zephyr 2 autorstwa heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 jest minimalistyczną skórką stworzoną przez jurialmunkey i zmodowaną do pracy z Kodi 19 Matrix przez pkscout. Skórka została zaprojektowana jako prosta, aby użytkownik mógł skupić się na swojej zawartości multimedialnej. Oprócz domyślnego jasnego schematu kolorów, skórka zawiera również kilka ciemniejszych wariantów.

extension.description: Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey und ist ein minimalistisches, klares und simples Interface für deine Medien mit dem gewissen Etwas.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.

Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded est basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr, créé par jurialmunkey. Arctic se focalise sur le fait d'être simple, claire et minimaliste.

extension.news:
[COLOR lavender][B]Order Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]1.2.3:[/B] - Add-on metadata update with an icon fix.
[B]1.2.2:[/B] - Ported the improvements from the Leia version to the Matrix version.
[B]1.2.1:[/B] - Renamed "Save and exit" to "Save and reload", makes it clearer. - Added "Save and exit". Use this when save + reload happens to crash your Kodi. After saving, restart Kodi manually to see the changes. - Experimental Matrix version now available.
[B]1.2.0:[/B] - Fixed a case when the add-on failed to read the favourites file because of Unicode strings. (Thanks to [I]msauers[/I] for the report.) - Changed the label and description of the 'Restart...' button to 'Restore...', which is clearer.
[B]1.1.1:[/B] - Added menu items for a more traditional add-on UX. - Improved the profile reloading process.
[B]1.1.0:[/B] - Improved the profile reloading process, it was crashing on Kodi 17.6.
[B]1.0.4:[/B] - Safer handling of unicode text. - Optimizations, simplified the code even more.
[B]1.0.3:[/B] - Added a proper custom dialog interface. - Greatly simplified the code, much faster to use.
[B]1.0.2:[/B] - Fix for when the favorite item has unicode text.
extension.description: Lets you reorder the entries in your Favourites. Use this to organize your Favourites.
Stream From EasyNews....Ported from original addon
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon or have any affiliation with the website owners

extension.description: Orion is a system for caching search and scraping results for later reuse. Metadata and links on Orion are maintained by the community. Searches are cached so that subsequent users can quickly access the results without having to go through a lengthy scraping process themselves. The Orion Kodi addon does not provide any search or playback features, but it can easily be integrated into any other addon, website, or standalone program with minimal effort.
extension.disclaimer: Orion does not create, host, or distribute any files or videos. Orion is a caching service providing low-level API access to a community-maintained storage of textual data. All metadata and links available through Orion are scraped, processed, and submitted by community users. Due to the volume, velocity, and complexity of the data, Orion cannot inspect or validate the content submitted by users. Data on Orion may therefore be inaccurate, out-dated, or in other ways unusable. Orion does not guarantee the validity or integrity of the data available through its API and does not take liability for any of the data submitted by its users. Users take the risk and are responsible for the manner in which they utilize the Orion API.

extension.description: The Gaia repository containing only essential addons. The repository only holds addons that are needed to install Gaia. Any other optional third-party addons that extended the functionality of Gaia must be installed manually or downloaded from the third-party repository.
extension.disclaimer: Gaia and its developers are not affiliated with Kodi or any of the services used in the addon. Gaia and its developers do not create, host, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon. Gaia simply searches publicly available sources for content. Gaia is, and always will be, free and open-source. None of its code or resources may be sold or redistributed for commercial purposes.

extension.description: The Gaia repository containing both essential and optional addons. The repository holds addons that are needed to install Gaia, but also has optional third-party addons that can be installed to extended the functionality of Gaia.
extension.disclaimer: Gaia and its developers are not affiliated with Kodi or any of the services used in the addon. Gaia and its developers do not create, host, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon. Gaia simply searches publicly available sources for content. Gaia is, and always will be, free and open-source. None of its code or resources may be sold or redistributed for commercial purposes.
